description: Add rr list to display a human-readable inventory of Rancher clusters.

userStories.title: List clusters via CLI
userStories.description: As a user, I want to run rr list to see a list of clusters so I can quickly confirm what is available.
acceptanceCriteria: Running rr list invokes RancherHttpClient.get_clusters() exactly once per command execution
Output is a table-style text format with NAME and ID columns
When zero clusters are returned, output includes a header and a "no clusters found" message
Exit code is 0 on successful retrieval

userStories.title: Handle Rancher API errors gracefully
userStories.description: As a user, I want rr list to fail softly when Rancher is unreachable so my scripts do not hard-fail.
acceptanceCriteria: If get_clusters() returns an error, print a concise error message and still exit 0
Output includes the empty list state with a header and a "no clusters found" message
Error output is routed through the centralized shell output helper
